content: row 2 knit all stitches repeat row 1 and 2 until 7 8 9 stitches remain on each needle 28 32 36 stitches total divide stitches evenly over 2 needles for grafting graft your toes closed using kitchener stitch weave in your ends and block your sock cu# down sock with shadow wrap heel lindsey gustafson - 2024
